column2: "Have you been to Kuron, senpai? The enemies there are really strong."
"Their movements are really weird, so I'm having a hard time knowing when to attack. Orota Biketta is what's giving me the most trouble."
"Those face-like parts pop in and out, and I can't get my head around how I should be attacking it."
"I really hate to keep bothering you, senpai, but can you show me how to beat it with a Just Attack?"
